definition: cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect
cold and detached towards sb/lack of regard/indifference/neglect

sentences.english: The quite demeanor of the Capricorn is easily misinterpreted as cold and hard hearted.
sentences.chinese: 摩羯的這種表現很容易讓人誤解爲冷漠和硬心腸。

sentences.english: After a certain point she became impassive detached utterly from him.
sentences.chinese: 過了某一點後，她變得冷漠無情，對他沒有一絲戀眷。

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天氣陰暗，我就會非常的冷漠，無奈，甚至悲傷。

sentences.english: At the beginning they met with much stupidity and apathy.
sentences.chinese: 開始的幾次會議他們遭遇了很多麻木和冷漠。

sentences.english: They seem indifferent actually very eager to help with chihiro.
sentences.chinese: 她們表面上冷漠實際上卻無比熱心的幫助着千尋。

sentences.english: They cut up rough , sometimes to person brutal, want to be constant very inhospitality with heartless.
sentences.chinese: 他們憤怒，有時對人兇暴，要不變得很冷漠和無情。

sentences.english: Example: She never speaks to us at work; she's so standoffish.
sentences.chinese: 她在工作中從不和我們說話，她真冷漠。

sentences.english: Forgot that your I cannot achieve, missing arrives at your indifference.
sentences.chinese: 忘記你我做不到，思念抵不過你的冷漠。

sentences.english: Two stone lions, cold and aloof, stand beside in front of the gate.
sentences.chinese: 門口蹲着兩個大石獅子，嚴峻冷漠。

sentences.english: We ought to remain a little aloof and take pleasure in this aloofness, the interweave of a given masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 並享受着這種冷漠，伴着顫抖來品味名著。

sentences.english: He was piqued by her indifference.
sentences.chinese: 她的冷漠傷害了他的自尊心。

sentences.english: Homies looking so cool, cool, Im cool_t!
sentences.chinese: 我的家人看起來對我是那麼冷漠。

sentences.english: They are actually very cold on the surface with the help of enthusiastic Chihiro.
sentences.chinese: 她們表面上冷漠實際上卻無比熱心的幫助着千尋。

sentences.english: The swift and indifferent placidity of that look troubled me.
sentences.chinese: 那一掃而過的冷漠沉靜的目光使我深感不安。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang seems as cold as stone toward the unfortunate or under-priviledged.
sentences.chinese: 王先生對那些貧窮的人似乎很冷漠。

definition: as cold as ice and frost (idiom, usually of woman); icy manner/frigid
unkind/harsh/cutting/mean/acrimony/to embezzle by making illegal deductions
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
